mapper.select: SELECT dept_cd AS deptCd, dept_name AS deptName, dept_id AS deptId, full_name AS fullName, salary, gender, memo, hire_date AS hireDate, married, pos_name AS posName, pos_code AS posCode FROM dept order by dept_id

SELECT dept_cd AS deptCd, dept_name AS deptName, dept_id AS deptId, full_name AS fullName, salary, gender, memo, hire_date AS hireDate, married, pos_name AS posName, pos_code AS posCode FROM dept WHERE dept_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dept (dept_cd, dept_name, full_name, salary, gender, memo, hire_date, married, pos_name, pos_code) VALUES (#{deptCd}, #{deptName}, #{fullName}, #{salary}, #{gender}, #{memo}, #{hireDate}, #{married}, #{posName}, #{posCode})
